text: I want to tell you this story about the
time I almost got kidnapped in the trunk
of a red Mazda
Miata it's the day after graduating from

and this guy pulls up in this red Mazda
and he starts looking through my stuff
and he buys a piece of art that I made
and it turns out he's alone in town for

road trip before he goes into the Peace
Corp so I invite him out for a beer and
he tells me all about his passion for
making a difference in the

so where you stay say
tonight and he makes it worse by saying
actually I don't have a

do we've all been there

trunk so then I hear myself saying hey
I've got an air bed you can stay on in
my living
room and the voice in my head goes wait
what that night I'm laying in bed I'm

my god what have I done there's a

room what if he's

and the piece of art he bought at the

he's a teacher
now this was my first hosting experience

reviews now if you've got less than

Changes High reputation beats High
